name: GetFileVersionsUnderRetention
description:
Fetch file versions under a specific retention policy assignment.

This tool retrieves a list of file versions that are currently under retention for a specified retention policy assignment. Use it to manage or review file retention statuses.

parameters.name: retention_policy_assignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the retention policy assignment to retrieve file versions under retention.

value_schema.description: The ID of the retention policy assignment.

parameters.name: pagination_start_marker
parameters.description: Defines the position marker to start returning results. Requires `usemarker` to be `true` for marker-based pagination.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of file versions to return per page during retrieval.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: retention_policy_assignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the retention policy assignment.

value_schema.description: The ID of the retention policy assignment.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
